data.title: Invalid - Redmi Note 9S miui 14.0.3 eu: Iran region clock is + 1 hour on auto
data.meta_description: Hi i found another bug for my phone note 9s on miui 14.0.3 eu rom. this one is totally fixed in last update of global rom but now on eu isn't ok. So when i...
data.meta_site_name: Unofficial Xiaomi European Community | MIUI ROM Since 2010
data.text:
Hi i found another bug for my phone note 9s on miui 14.0.3 eu rom. this one is totally fixed in last update of global rom but now on eu isn't ok. So when i manually change the time, some apps like telegram or instagram show issues and Network parameters have to be updated for iran region. check the screenshot:

Attachments

Screenshot_2023-04-20-10-58-35-518_com.android.chrome.jpg

I have exact same issue on Curtana, iran no longer has day light saving time but EU rom for this device still moves clock forward for summer time which makes it wrong.

Iran official time zone now is ( Tehran = gmt+3:30 ) but this rom uses gmt +4:30

please fix this.

I have exact same issue on Curtana, iran no longer has day light saving time but EU rom for this device still moves clock forward for summer time which makes it wrong.

should also mention i ise latest miui 14 stable rom for this device.

please fix this.

You got the same issue as here:

Invalid - Time zone offset error (Poco X3 NFC)

The time zone where I am residing is in Mexico City, here it is in "UTC-6" however even with the "Set time zone automatically" option it continues to claim "UTC-5", which in the Global ROM this does not happen. I hope they can fix it soon or if it is a problem that I can solve I will be...

But there's nothing we can do to help with that, timezone data is supposed to be updated by Google Play services.

You got the same issue as here:

Invalid - Time zone offset error (Poco X3 NFC)

The time zone where I am residing is in Mexico City, here it is in "UTC-6" however even with the "Set time zone automatically" option it continues to claim "UTC-5", which in the Global ROM this does not happen. I hope they can fix it soon or if it is a problem that I can solve I will be...

But there's nothing we can do to help with that, timezone data is supposed to be updated by Google Play services.

well it is fixed by google play services in xiaomi original global rom , but EU for some reason doesn't get fixed , do you have any idea why

well it is fixed by google play services in xiaomi original global rom , but EU for some reason doesn't get fixed , do you have any idea why

I don't have any of those devices, so no.
